start: There is infection in the Clan.
discovered: The Clan has met an outsider with a mysterious illness. The Clan will keep an eye on it.
fungal_1: The disease appears to be fungal in nature.
parasitic_1: The infection seems to be caused by some sort of parasite.
void_1: The infection seems to be... supernatural, in origin. Proceed with caution.
spread_by_bite: One becomes infected when bitten by an infected creature.
cure_found: A cure to the disease has been discovered! It consists of a mixture of herb1, herb2, herb3 and herb4.
partial_cure: Even if it's not a full cure, it seems that some herbs are able to temporarily reverse the infection's progression.
herb_death: The infection has begun killing off herbs in the territory at an alarming rate.
prey_death: Prey has started being affected by the infection. Hunting patrols avoid the sick prey and come home with less food each day.
parasitic_2: While the body slowly dies, the brain stays active.
void_2: Victims are very prone to violence. Proceed with caution.
cure_moons_discovered: It takes a few moons for the cure for the infection to work.
clan_one_infected_1: o_cClan has been showing up to Gatherings with less and less cats, the scent of the infection wafting from their tired medicine cats.
